name: Piano Magic 3
description:
Play piano game 2021 for free on your mobile now!

RULES OF THE GAME
1. Choose your favorite song
2. Tap all the black meow tiles
3. Avoid the blank space and feel the beat!
That's it!

KEY FEATURES
- Real music feeling when tapping the black tiles
- Many HOT songs update weekly
- Many genres of music: classical, pop, EDM, country, etc.
- Feel the instruments you love: piano, guitar, violin, drums, harp, and others

Just play and enjoy all beautiful songs to have relaxing time! So, get ready and find out your favorite melody in this game for free!

SUPPORT
If you have any ideas or problems, please let us know via email: onehitonekill777@gmail.com
Now, stay tune and enjoy the game!
